name: Eleazar Eskin
content: Eskin Lab, University of California, Los Angeles ZarLab Eleazar Eskin Professor and Chair Department of Computational Medicine Professor Computer Science Human Genetics University of California, Los Angeles Mailing Address: Engineering VI rm. 286A 404 Westwood Plaza Los Angeles, CA 90095-1596 Office:Engineering VI rm. 286A Email:eeskin at cs dot ucla dot edu Lab Website URL: http://zarlab.cs.ucla.edu Research Focus: Our research focuses on developing techniques for solving the challenging computational problems that arise in attempting to understand the genetic basis of human disease. I serve as the Chair of the Department of Computational Medicine. Our lab is also affiliated with both the Computer Science and the Human Genetics departments. We are also part of the UCLA Bioinformatics community. Full CV. Check out our lab website for more information on our group, our research, our papers and our teaching. Research Areas: BioinformaticsGeneticsGenomicsMachine Learning
